testcase.name: Podam should not fill POJO's attributes annotated with @PodamExclude
Podam should handle both native and wrapped integer values with @PodamIntValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped boolean values with @PodamBooleanValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped byte values with @PodamByteValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped char values with @PodamCharValue annotation
Podam should handle immutable POJOs annotated with @PodamConstructor
Podam should handle both native and wrapped float values with @PodamFloatValue annotation
Podam should handle POJOs with constructors that have one or more self references to the POJO class, provided the required constructor is annotated with @PodamConstructor
Podam should handle both native and wrapped long values with @PodamLongValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
